text: I appreciate your enthusiasm, but pinging me three times in different places is not going to have any positive effect. I receive the notification already when you open a pull request, tagging me only increases the noise. When I have the time, I'd look at the pull requests anyways

text:
OHHHH I apologize!
Kindly take a look, whenever you're free to!

text: So you guys receive a notification for every PR on Yggdrasil?
